LightningComponentBundle.description: A Lightning Web Component that displays a map of markers that are geographically close to a given geolocation.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: The title to be used at the top of the card.

property.name: fieldApiName
property.label: The location field of this object to use
property.description: The field in this object that contains the location on which to center the map.

property.name: additionalWhereClause
property.label: Additional WHERE clause predicate
property.description: A SOQL WHERE clause expression to append to the SOQL query that finds nearby records; for example, any restrictions that depend on another field in the record.

property.name: initialUnits
property.label: Initial units
property.description: The initial selection for units (miles or kilometers)

property.name: initialZoomLevel
property.label: Initial zoom level
property.description: The initial zoom level for the map (1-22, defaults to 15).

property.name: drawCircle
property.label: Draw a circle around center marker
property.description: If checked, draws a circle around the center marker of this record.

property.name: circleColor
property.label: Circle color
property.description: The color of the circle drawn.

property.name: showDataTable
property.label: Show a table of the nearby locations
property.description: Show a table of the nearby locations, including distance from the center.
